参考書(アルファベット順)

  • Acemoglu (2009): “Introduction to Modern Economic Growth,” Princeton University Press.
  • Adda and Cooper (2003): “Dynamic Economics,” The MIT Press.
  • Caraiani (2018): “Introduction to Quantitative Macroeconomics using Julia,” Academic Press.
    • Juliaのバージョンが古い(<1.0)ので注意
  • Fehr and Kindermann (2018): “Introduction to Computational Economics using Fortran,” Oxford University Press.
  • Heer and Maussner (2009): “Dynamic General Equilibrium Modeling -2nd Edition,” Springer.
  • Judd (1998): “Numerical Methods in Economics,” The MIT Press.
  • Ljungqvist and Sargent (2018): “Recursive Macroeconomics,” The MIT Press.
  • Miao (2014): “Economic Dynamics in Discrete Time,” The MIT Press.
  • Miranda and Fackler (2002): “Applied Computational Economics and Finance,” The MIT Press.
  • Stachurski (2009): “Economic Dynamics,” The MIT Press.
  • Stokey and Lucas with Prescott (1989): “Recursive Methods in Economic Dynamics,” Harvard University Press.
